title: Drawing, Design for Oval Dining Table "B" of Mahogany, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Oval Dining Table "B" of Mahogany
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower right: OVAL DINING TABLE / OF MAHOGANY / B; at upper right of image with arrow pointing to table top: Top 4'-9"
dimensions: 22.9 x 24.1 cm (9 x 9 1/2 in. ); irregular sheet
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Oval molded table top raised on 5 columnar supports sitting atop rectangular molded base terminating in reeded splayed legs on brass feet with casters; carved water leaf atop each foot.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Oval Dining Table "B" of Mahogany, 1900–05. Graphite on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-158
